system.description: Contested STR check. If ooze wins, it enters target's body and target takes [[/r 1d4]] CON damage and is paralyzed until ooze removed. Can't heal while infected. DC 14 CON each day or [[/r 1d4]] CON damage. Die at 0 CON. Corpse births [[/r 1d4]]+1 marrow oozes. A heal or restoration spell cures the infection and casts the ooze out of the target's body.
